cards.name: Serenity
cards.description:
Retain Purge.
Enemy enters Calm and changes Intent.

cards.name: Serenity+
cards.description:
Retain Purge.
Enemy enters Calm and changes Intent.

cards.name: Burn
cards.description:
Exhaust.
When drawn,
draw a card.
You take 1 more damage.

cards.name: Burn+1
cards.description:
Downgrade this card.
When drawn,
draw a card.
You take 2 more damage.
Downgrades instead of exhausting.

relics.name: Blurry Lens
relics.flavorText: Everything looks strangely flawed through it.

relics.name: Bottled Champ
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose 2 Attacks and/or Skills in your deck. When playing one of them, play the other as well.
relics.flavorText: In case of CHAMP, break glass.

relics.name: Businesscard of Thorton Minutepen
relics.description:
Identifies you as
"Thorton Minutepen".
Bank Manager.
relics.flavorText: What was that guy even doing here?

relics.name: Core of the Defect
relics.description: The first 2 powers each combat are played 3 times.

relics.name: Curiousity
relics.description: Whenever a Power is applied to you, gain 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Hated by cardgame players all across the globe.

relics.name: Divine Prayer Bead
relics.description: Whenever you draw an extra card, gain 2 Mantra.

relics.name: Essence of Showmanship
relics.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, play a copy of it.
relics.flavorText: If you look real closely, there actually is something up my sleeve.

relics.name: Garrote of the Silent
relics.description: Whenever you deal damage, that enemy loses 2 HP for every card you play this turn.
relics.flavorText: Looks like it was never used.

relics.name: Helmet...thing?
relics.description: Whenever you gain Block, draw a card. Whenever you draw a Status card, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: Some modifications seem to have been made.

relics.name: Hexaghost Pyroplasm
relics.description: Every 36th card played is played 6 times.
relics.flavorText: Big enough payoff to be giddy. Too many cards to play to remember it exists when it kicks in.

relics.name: Pinecone
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 1 Thorns. Whenever you play a Skill, double your Thorns. At the start of your turn, lose all Thorns gained this way.
relics.flavorText: Whenever you play a Thorn, gain 3 Skills.

relics.name: Polished Lamp
relics.description: At the beginning of combat, choose a rare Attack or Skill, put it into your hand. It costs 1 less.
relics.flavorText: Grants a Wish. Not to be confused with a Fish, Dish or Lish.

relics.name: Shifting Mass
relics.description:
Whenever you play a card, flip this relic.
If it was a Skill, gain 3 Strength this turn.
relics.flavorText: Constantly in flux between delectable and disgusting.

relics.name: Timepiece
relics.description: Turns back the clock for you at the expense of your enemies once. After combat, restores half your missing HP.
relics.flavorText: It has no clockhands. The letters T E are carved in its back.

relics.name: Youkai Huntress' Zeal
relics.description:
If you lost HP last turn, gain [E] .
Whenever you Block damage, gain that much Strength until the end of your turn.
relics.flavorText: Born from a lifetime of hunting demons and sweeping floors.

keywords.name: Paleoftheancients:burn
keywords.description:
Burned creatures take more damage from all attacks equal to the amount of Burn on them.
When the stack of Burn passes a multiple of 4, apply 1 Weak.
On monsters, Burn is halved at the end of turn.

keywords.name: Paleoftheancients:stacked
keywords.description: Numbers are reduced by the amount of cards in the drawpile.
